Name: Winter Blue Iris
SeedDescription: Plant them in winter. Take 14 days to produce a tiny beautiful flower.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Sähen im Winter. Es brauch 14 Tage Zeit, um eine winzige schöne Blume zu produzieren.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: À planter en hiver. Il faudra 14 jours pour arriver à maturité.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте зимой. Через 14 дней вырастает прекрасный голубой цветок.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 在冬天种植，需要14天长出美丽的小花
